pages.text: Carrying around enough [Ink](book://magic/ink) with you to maintain your magical equipment has become both a chore and a space hog in your inventory.\Now that you're familiar with [Ink](book://magic/ink), it's time for a new creation: the Pigment Palette.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Capable of storing sizable amounts of [Ink](book://magic/ink), making you able to supply all your magical equipment. It is not suited for powering your machines, though.\_Now you are a true Artist of Color._
